Books List
resources.description:
Returns a list with all books.

```response:200
{
	"books": [
		{
			"ISBN": "1567197439746",
			"title": "title",
			"author": "author",
			"publication_year": 2021,
			"language": "pt-BR",
			"publisher": "publisher",
			"genres": [
				"Religion & Spirituality"
			],
			"number_of_pages": 338,
			"price": "115.00",
			"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg"
		},
		{
			"ISBN": "1661193256266",
			"title": "title",
			"author": "author",
			"publication_year": 1991,
			"language": "es-ES",
			"publisher": "publisher",
			"genres": [
				"Graphic Novel"
			],
			"number_of_pages": 818,
			"price": "74.00",
			"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg"
		},
		...
		{
			"ISBN": "2895700661253",
			"title": "title",
			"author": "author",
			"publication_year": 2002,
			"language": "es-ES",
			"publisher": "publisher",
			"genres": [
				"Humor"
			],
			"number_of_pages": 159,
			"price": "93.00",
			"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg"
		},
		...		
	]
}
```

resources.name: Filter Books
resources.description:
Filter books by price interval, publication year interval, genres and languages and, returns the found books.

```response:200
{
	"books": [
		{
			"ISBN": "4127474808839",
			"title": "title",
			"author": "author",
			"publication_year": 1981,
			"language": "es-ES",
			"publisher": "publisher",
			"genres": [
				"Action & Adventure",
				"Fantasy"
			],
			"number_of_pages": 541,
			"price": "106.00",
			"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: Search Books
resources.description:
Search books by ISBN, title and author and, returns the found books.

```response:200
{
	"books": [
		{
			"ISBN": "1567197439746",
			"title": "title",
			"author": "author",
			"publication_year": 2021,
			"language": "pt-BR",
			"publisher": "publisher",
			"genres": [
				"Religion & Spirituality"
			],
			"number_of_pages": 338,
			"price": "115.00",
			"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: Book Selected
resources.description:
If it exists, returns the book that has the ISBN specified in the URL.
 
 ```response:200
{
	"book": {
		"ISBN": "2960421593270",
		"title": "title",
		"author": "author",
		"publication_year": 1966,
		"language": "pt-BR",
		"publisher": "publisher",
		"genres": [
			"Action & Adventure"
		],
		"number_of_pages": 316,
		"price": "142.00",
		"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg"
	}
}
```

```response:404
{
	"detail": "Book not found"
}
```
